name: Meek and the Mighty
description:
Made for GMTK 2022

Meek and the Mighty is a game about a ratfolk adventurer fighting in a tournament. You control the strength of their attack and shield by assigning dice to each and then rolling to see the strength.

Hold 'alt' and hover over dice to see their descriptions.

The game currently has no end other than being defeated, feel free to let your ratfolk adventurer die to see the thankyou screen.

Leave a comment with your jam entries so I can play them.
